Title: Battlestar Galactica: Razor
Writer: Ronald D. Moore (developed by), Michael Taylor, Glen A. Larson (based on the series created by: "Battlestar Galactica")
Actors: Edward James Olmos, Mary McDonnell, Katee Sackhoff, Jamie Bamber
Plot: A two-hour Battlestar Galactica special that tells the story of the Battlestar Pegasus several months prior to it finding the Galactica.
